description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Spirit Box is a tool for communicating with the other side.  Open your mind, and let the spirits move your hands.  Host a spirit party, and pass the controller around.  The results will amaze you...
description.short: The Spirit Box is a tool for communicating with the other side.  Open your mind, and let the spirits move your hands.  Host a spirit party, and pass the controller around.  The results will amaze you...
